class.name: BBCodeToken
class.description: BBCode tokens generated from calls to [method BBCodeParser.get_items]. [b]Note:[/b] When the parser is cleared or freed, all of its tokens are also freed. Do not hold on to references of tokens for longer than necessary.

members.member: For opening tags, this contains the names and values of all parameters. Values are strings, except for parameters without an explicit value, as they have [code]null[/code] as their value instead.
For text tokens, this is the text itself. For tags, it is the name of the tag.

constants.constant: Literal text. [member value] contains the text.
Opening tag. [member value] contains the tag name and [member parameters] is filled.
Closing tag. [member value] contains the tag name.
